properties.id: The ID of the campaign budget.
properties.type: The type of the campaign budget
properties.currency_code:
The currency code of the campaign budget.

@example usd
properties.limit: The limit of the campaign budget
properties.used: How much of the budget has been used. if the `limit` is `spend`, this property holds the total amount discounted so far. if the `limit` is `usage`, it holds the number of times the campaign's promotions have been used so far.

properties.name: The name of the campaign
properties.campaign_identifier: The campaign's identifier, such as a Google Tag ID.
properties.starts_at: The date that the campaign starts.
properties.ends_at: The date that the campaign ends.

properties.id: The ID of the promotion rule value.
properties.value: The value of the promotion rule.

properties.id: The ID of the promotion rule.
properties.description: The description of the promotion rule
properties.attribute:
The attribute of the promotion rule.

@example customer_group_id
properties.operator:
The operator of the promotion rule.

@example in

properties.is_automatic: Whether the promotion is applied automatic. If disabled, the customer must enter the code during checkout.

properties.id: The ID of the application method.
properties.value: The value of the application method
properties.currency_code:
The currency code of the application method.

@example usd
properties.max_quantity: The max quantity allowed in the cart for the associated promotion to be applied.
properties.apply_to_quantity: The quantity that results from matching the `buyget` promotion's condition. For example, if the promotion is a "Buy 2 shirts get 1 free", the value of this attribute is `1`.
properties.buy_rules_min_quantity: The minimum quantity required for a `buyget` promotion to be applied. For example, if the promotion is a "Buy 2 shirts get 1 free", the value of this attribute is `2`.
properties.type: The application method's type. If it's `fixed`, the promotion discounts a fixed amount. If it's `percentage`, the promotion discounts a percentage.
properties.target_type: Which item does the promotion apply to. `items` mean the promotion applies to the cart's items; `shipping_methods` means the promotion applies to the cart's shipping methods; `order` means the promotion applies on the entire order.
properties.allocation: How is the promotion amount discounted. `each` means the discounted amount is applied on each applicable item; `across` means the discounted amount is split accross the applicable items.
